prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GlobalCuisine
Title: Exotic Foods from Around the World: A Journey through Culinary Delights
Description: Dive into a gastronomic adventure as we explore unique and exotic foods from every corner of the globe. This comprehensive guide includes recipes, cultural significance, and tips on where to find the best dishes.
I am interested in the website GlobalCuisine, mainly because I haven't tried many new meals out there yet. I think the article will be very interesting and inspire me to try new things.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GreenEarthNews
Title: The Impact of Climate Change on Global Biodiversity: A Deep Dive
Description: Explore the alarming effects of climate change on the planet's biodiversity. This article offers comprehensive research findings on species extinction, habitat loss, and changes in ecosystems, along with proposed solutions for a more sustainable future.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumWorld
Title: Quantum Computing Breakthroughs: How They're Shaping Our Future
Description: Unravel the mysteries of the quantum world with this insightful article, detailing the latest advancements in quantum computing. Learn how these breakthroughs are shaping our future, from data encryption and decryption, to disease modeling, and beyond. Appreciate the complex relationships between quantum physics, computing, and everyday life.
Yes, this looks very complex but I think it would be quite educational for me.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CraftyCreations
Title: DIY Home Décor: Unleash Your Creativity with Upcycling Projects
Description: With this comprehensive guide, transform your home space with creative, sustainable, and cost-effective DIY projects using upcycled materials. Learn how to turn your old items into valuable pieces of décor. From rustic wall hangings to chic furniture, let's explore the world of upcycling together.
No, at least not until I get an affordable home for myself in the future.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceFrontier
Title: Life on Mars: The Feasibility of Interplanetary Colonization 
Description: Delve into the exciting frontier of space travel as we explore the feasibility of establishing human colonies on Mars. This comprehensive report looks into the logistical, technical, and ethical considerations of such an endeavor, and discusses the recent advancements in space technology that have brought us closer to making this a reality. Learn what life on Mars might look like and how it could impact our future here on Earth.
Yes, I've always found Mars to be a fascinating planet.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MindBodyWellness
Title: The Role of Yoga in Stress Management: Breathing Techniques to Boost Your Mental Health
Description: Understand the science behind yoga and how it can drastically improve your mental well-being and stress levels. This article covers various breathing techniques, yoga postures and their benefits, and practical tips on how to incorporate yoga into your daily routine, even if you're a complete beginner. Learn how yoga can help you in developing better stress management and enhancing overall mental health.
No, I'm not really much of a Yoga guy.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FictionFusion
Title: "Exploring Literary Styles: An Analysis of Magic Realism in Modern Literature"
Description: Embark on a literary journey as we dissect the fascinating genre of magic realism. This insightful analysis dives into prominent works of modern literature, shedding light on the intricate blend of reality and fantasy that defines this genre. Learn about the historical context that gave rise to magic realism, and explore its influence in shaping contemporary storytelling. Whether you're a bookworm or an occasional reader, this article aims to deepen your understanding of literary styles and their impact on narratives.
No, I really like to read but I think I would get distracted pretty easily while reading that article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptoUniverse
Title: Beyond Bitcoin: An Insight into the World of Altcoins and Blockchain Technology
Description: This comprehensive guide uncovers the exciting world beyond Bitcoin, introducing a myriad of other cryptocurrencies colloquially known as 'Altcoins'. Understand the technology that underpins them - Blockchain, and learn about how it's revolutionising various industries beyond finance. Whether you're a crypto enthusiast or a curious novice, this article attempts to demystify the complexities of the crypto world, offering practical insights and future predictions.
No, I think crypto is a failing currency.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HistoricalChronicles
Title: "Unveiling the Secrets of the Pyramids: An In-depth Investigation into Ancient Egyptian Civilization"
Description: Journey back in time with this comprehensive exploration into the mysteries of Ancient Egypt, focusing specifically on the marvels of the Pyramids. Through combining historical accounts, archaeological discoveries, and advanced technology, we aim to offer fresh perspectives on the construction, purpose, and cultural significance of these iconic structures. Whether you're a seasoned history aficionado or a casual learner, this article will satisfy your curiosity and expand your knowledge about one of the most intriguing civilizations in human history.
Yes, I've always been a history guy.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
